Details:
* **Type**: String
* Captures the name of the service cluster on which HA will be set up.

* **Type**: Boolean
* **Possible values**: ``true`` or ``false``
* **Default value**: ``false``
* Indicates whether to enable HA for the Kubernetes (K8s) service node or not. Set to ``true`` to enable, ``false`` to disable.

* **Type**: String
* This is a mandatory and user-configurable parameter.
* Captures the virtual IP address for the K8s service node HA setup. Ensure that the ``virtual_ip_address`` does not belong to the ``dynamic_range`` or ``static_range`` mentioned in the `network_spec.yml <../Provision/provisionparams.html#id6>`_.

* **Type**: IP address
* Specify this to use an external load balancer instead of the kube-vip loadbalancer.

* **Type**: Port number
* Captures the port for the external loadbalancer.
* This port must be unique and not in use.

.. note:: Ensure to not use the 6443 port.

* **Type**: Comma-separated list
* List of service tags of active K8s service nodes. Multiple tags can be provided with commas.
